title: STUCK AFTER CHAMP SELECT
body: CANT GET IN THE GAME AFTER SELECTING THE CHAMP, BUT WE CAN STILL CHAT, AND EVERYONE TRY TO RESTART THE CLIENT, AFTER THAT THERE WAS NOTHING, FIX PLZ

replies.body:
HI

Thanks for letting us know - we're just coming out of a maintenance window and checking into the cause now.

You can find the latest info here - https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/d78xVABN-oce-platform-maintenance-2017-08-30-530am-aest

Cheers
Mindstar
Yo, was just wondering if you guys had an ETA on a possible fix?
A MAINTENANCE TOOK U GUYS MORE THAN 6 HOURS, BASE ON A  MILLIONS PLAYER'S SERVER, AND WILL TAKE LONGER? JUST A NORMALY MAINTENANCE? DISSAPOINTED
IS YOUR CAPS LOCK BUTTON STUCK???
No one cares of your insignificant rant.
idc those shot u said so dont reply below my discussion crap
